narratives.title: DePIN: Physical Infrastructure Surge
narratives.description: Detected 4 signals across 4 different sources (onchain, twitter, github, report) indicating emerging activity in depin. Key themes include: depin, physical-infrastructure, render, network, helium. Physical infrastructure networks being tokenized on Solana.

signals.content: Render Network: GPU compute usage up 280% — 15,000+ active node operators on Solana
@aeyakovenko: DePIN on Solana is quietly becoming massive. Helium, Render, Hivemapper — real hardware, real revenue.
helium-iot-sdk: Helium IoT network SDK for building connected devices on Solana
Messari Research: DePIN on Solana — Physical infrastructure networks generating $50M+ annual protocol revenue

ideas.title: Developer SDK for Depin
ideas.description: Build a comprehensive TypeScript/Rust SDK that simplifies integration with depin-related protocols. Include code examples, CLI tools, and testing utilities.
ideas.reasoning: With 4 signals showing development activity, there's clear demand for tooling. Developers need easier ways to build on this narrative.

ideas.title: DePIN Analytics Dashboard
ideas.description: Real-time dashboard aggregating all depin activity on Solana. Track metrics, compare protocols, and identify trends before they go mainstream.
ideas.reasoning: Cross-source signals (4 sources) indicate fragmented information. Users need a single place to monitor this space.

ideas.title: "DePIN on Solana" Interactive Course
ideas.description: Comprehensive video course + interactive coding challenges teaching developers how to build in this space. Include real-world examples from detected protocols.
ideas.reasoning: Emerging narrative with 1 key voice mentions. Early educational content can capture attention as ecosystem grows.
ideas.targetAudience: Developers new to this Solana vertical

ideas.title: Smart Alert & Automation Platform
ideas.description: Custom alerts and automated actions for depin, render, gpu events. Set conditions, get notified, auto-execute strategies.
ideas.reasoning: High velocity (3.0x growth) means things move fast. Users need automation to keep up and capitalize on opportunities.

ideas.title: Depin Integration Layer
ideas.description: Middleware that connects existing Solana apps to emerging depin protocols. Plug-and-play integration for wallets, dApps, and marketplaces.
ideas.reasoning: Multiple protocols detected (4 signals) but no standard integration. First-mover advantage for abstraction layer.

narratives.title: Token Extensions: Adoption Rise
narratives.description: Detected 5 signals across 4 different sources (onchain, github, twitter, report) indicating emerging activity in token extensions. Key themes include: token-2022, token-extensions, adoption, transfer-hooks, confidential-transfers. Adoption of Token-2022 program and its advanced features.

signals.content: Token-2022 program usage spiked 340% this week — 1,847 new token mints using Token Extensions

@armaniferrante: Token-2022 adoption is accelerating. Transfer hooks enable programmable compliance — this changes everything for RWA on Solana.
Messari Research: Token Extensions on Solana — Programmable tokens and the path to institutional adoption
@rajgokal: Confidential transfers in Token-2022 are a game changer for institutional DeFi. Privacy without compromising compliance.
